title: How I created this website with Hugo

content:
I am Manas Varma K, currently an S1 B.Tech CSE-AI students in Amrita Vishwa Vidhyapeetham. I want to be a developer, explore the computer and tech world. I want to try all the new tech products, learn about them and their working. I also like to travel. In future I want to travel to many countries and also try all the different types of food. My hobbies include gaming, playing cricket, football and badminton. Thank you for visiting my website.
